{"step_by_step_thinking": "Lead poisoning inhibits some enzymes of the heme biosynthetic pathway, including delta-aminolevulinic acid dehydratase and ferrochelatase. The accumulation of a substance in the blood reflects the inhibition of these enzymes. From the given choices, the substance that accumulates in blood due to lead poisoning is delta amino levulinic acid.", "answer_choice": "D"}
